1: The Lord's city is in the holy hills.[b]
2: The Lord loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwelling places of Jacob.
3: People say wonderful things about you,[c] O city of God. (Selah)
4: I mention Rahab[d] and Babylon to my followers.[e] Here are[f] Philistia and Tyre, along with Ethiopia.[g] It is said of them, “This one was born there.”[h]
5: But it is said of Zion's residents,[i] “Each one of these[j] was born in her, and the Most High[k] makes her secure.”
6: The Lord writes in the census book of the nations,[l] “This one was born there.”[m] (Selah)
7: As for the singers, as well as the pipers— all of them sing within your walls.[n]
